######### Generated by Lwspanel #########
######### Ne pas modifier / Don't touch #########

# Redirections https septimmigration.com
RewriteEngine On
RewriteCond %{HTTP:X-Forwarded-Proto} !https
RewriteCond %{HTTPS} !on
RewriteCond %{HTTP_HOST} ^(?:www\.)?septimmigration\.com(?:.*)$ [nc]
RewriteRule ^(.*)$ https://%{HTTP_HOST}%{REQUEST_URI} [redirect=301,L]

######### End Generated by Lwspanel #########


######### Ajout pour React Router #########

<IfModule mod_rewrite.c>
  RewriteEngine On
  RewriteBase /

  # Ignorer les fichiers et dossiers r√©els
  RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f
  RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d

  # Rediriger tout le reste vers index.html
  RewriteRule ^ index.html [L]
</IfModule>
